body:
So, unfortunately my nan aged 78 died of lung cancer yesterday. She was the most sweetest person I've ever met, I wish I got to say a few last words to her, but I couldn't. If you have any relatives who have died recently, you must know how I feel. Bye everyone, and have a safe day.

-Harry.
body_tagged:

-Harry.

replies.body: Plz don't remind me of losing my Grandma Plz don't. It was like when I was around 12. It's been 4 years, of pain I barely knew her, we barely visited her. Plz don't remind others of their bad times.

replies.body: A couple years ago, my grndpa died :( it's sad cause i nevr and i mean NEVER met him....and my mom's dad died when she was a little girl :( he had a heart attack on a bus. I remember seeing all my family members crying ;(
